scripts.build: npm run copy-images && tweego -l src artifacts -o build/ECR.html
scripts.build-twee: npm run copy-images && tweego -d -l src artifacts -o build/ECR.twee
scripts.watch: npm run copy-images && tweego -l -w src artifacts -o build/ECR.html
scripts.build-fresh: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run build && npm run build-twee
